entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain or light snow changing to 30 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
